text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews Yada, yada. Not even a great Motherhood, Apple Pie speech. Trump never talked about Covid-19 & how it’s changed US. Easy 2 talk about future with hindsight 20/20. Harder to talk about now & the future. Trump lives in the past where he doesn’t have to confront today’s challenges
